website_summaries.verdict: A budget brush cutter that doesn't sacrifice power and cutting capability.
pros: Comes with an 8-inch head for  good maneuverability around obstacles
Accepts various attachments to become a blower, trimmer, and more
cons: Brush cutter takes more time to cover large areas due to the smaller cutting head

customer_reviews.title: This was a horrible experience.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, we were excited that it had attachments that we needed. The Remington ranchero ran total of 10 minutes. The help line was called to no avail. Called the help line again we were given a repair show in our area. My husband took it to the shop and was told they don't work on that junk. The help line was called again and after a little discussion we were given a supervisor and he cussed at my husband and hung up on him. This was a horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Judy LANE

customer_reviews.title: Working Great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I put the string trimmer head on the machine and trimmed up the heavy vegetation around the yard. It started well but required a minute or two to warm up. It didn't seem to have much power when it was cold but once it warmed up it was a monster. Just with the string I was knocking down small saplings and vines. The string advanced well and the machine ran well.
customer_reviews.author: P-Trainer

customer_reviews.title: This weed eater would not start no matter instructions followed or times tried!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for the exact purpose it was advertised. I wouldn't start or attempt to start at any time! I called the its "HELP line" to no positive changes. The HELP suggested I call a local "company service dealer", who advised me they weren't familiar with the company or its product, but that they would try servicing the product with a deposit and cost for parts. After a second call to the Help line only suggested what was told to me during the first Help call earlier. What use is a brand new weed-eater if it won't start? I cannot say how dissappointed this purchase made me feel!
customer_reviews.author: Larry H.

customer_reviews.title: Runs awesome, powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome as far as gas weedeaters go. Due to power requirements, I have to have gas powered tools, as the battery ones just wont handle the brush around here. This is easy to start, runs great and powerfully. Had to adjust the Idle initially, but is fine now. Got this one to use with my John deere attachments like brush cutters etc....Using the John deere weed head also with .105 string, and this thing cuts through crabgrass like butter. Using Echo powerblend 2 cycle oil. I imagine like all small 2 cycle gas engines, it will take some tinkering as it gets older, but that's no problem for someone with a little experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: If you cant change the blade, its pretty worthless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and for a year have enjoyed it. Thought it did a good job. I am now trying to change the blade to the trim line and guess what, as many people here are stating, it is not possible to loosen the bold. I too bent my rod tool. I am going to follow one of the recommendations and go down to the local hardware store and hope their Stihl tools will work. I would suggest anyone looking to buy this product to look elsewhere - if you can not change the blade, its pretty worthless. If you have to go to your local hardware store each time, it is pretty worthless.
customer_reviews.author: bhughes

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, thoroughly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool !!! It really clears heavy undergrowth just as described - I have a seriously neglected garden and was able to make a lot of progress. You do need to be pretty strong, it's not ultra-lightweight but that goes with its strength and power! Haven't tried the weedwacker attachment yet but it looks promising.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Gibson Giraud

customer_reviews.title: warranty work is slow
customer_reviews.text: After trying to start the new machine off and on for a couple of days as it almost started a few times, I took it in for warranty work. It took two weeks to get preliminary approval, but the shop has now made the repairs one month later and they are holding it for final approval from the company before returning it to me. Meanwhile, the weeds keep growing taller and taller. I've been set back a month so far on my weed abatement. And this is prime time. I don't even know how it works yet, but I am very disappointed with the support system when there's warranty work to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm sorry but I'm not happy for the first time with Remington
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry but I'm not happy for the first time with Remington . It had many scratches and even dust build up all over it . Kinda looks like it was a floor model or refurbished . It also needed to be tuned correctly for witch it was running rough and missing at high rpm's .
customer_reviews.author: SCOOBY

customer_reviews.title: Bump Head Assembly Item: 753-1161 Problem when threading cord
customer_reviews.text: Great power and effective in my needs other than the Bump Head Assembly. When treading the cord into the assembly the cord does not advance into it. Very difficult to reach product support. I need assistance from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Plasencia

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival. Poor quality control, and can't return.
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. Wont start...not even on starting fluid. Perhaps a short on the kill switch line as there's no spark. Have a garage full of equipment, I know my way around engines. Waited a few weeks to unbox for a project, and I'm 2 days past the return window. Now I have to figure it out. Unacceptable. Don't waste your money with poor quality control. Buy a better name.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: You will need to sharpen the cutting head Does a good job but guard is too small so you get hit with debris moving right to left Assembly was easy However.... the nut holding on the blade is torqued too much.... vise grips and air impact wrench to remove
customer_reviews.author: Brad Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase....box shows up with a bent shaft(second time) making it useless when you can't attach the brush cutter.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool I am cutting brush some small trees as ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool I am cutting brush some small trees as much as two inches thick. But only after putting a Renegade Blade on it. The blade that came with it was ok for small stuff...But I would invest in the carbide brush cutter blade.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Leaky piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: The carburetor and fuel lines on this are junk. Right out of the box the lines leaked gas. It ran just "okay" for about 3 months with occasionally dying and needing re-choke and re-start. Then it got progressively worse. At this point it wont run more than 20 seconds withough sputtering and dying from fuel loss. The connection of the fuel lines to the tank is horrible. Additionally i bought the pole saw attachment and it leaks all the bar oil out in 24hours. Do NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Coleman

customer_reviews.title: This is a good brush trimmer worthy of your consideration
customer_reviews.text: I like the feature of being able to use either the string trimmer or the blade. It really starts easily...the easiest I've ever had. I stopped using gas trimmers because of the trouble with starting issues, but soon realized the shortcomings of battery operated string trimmers, and have switched back to gas...so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Wooden Car DOC

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for thick brush.. Its not a chainsaw so don't try to cut down oak trees with it!!! think brush heavy grass is no challenge it will chop it down no issue.. arbor is 1".. use non-E gas and it will last!!
customer_reviews.author: michael mcneese

customer_reviews.title: Heads will not interchange
customer_reviews.text: It is literally imposssible to convert this from Brushcutter to Trimmer! Mainly because the Shaft Bushing hole that is supposed to line up with the locking rod slot does not exist! Both my son whos very strong and my huge husband thats in construction trades tried and no go!!! Would very much like refund!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Grossi

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing Defects
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be the answer to some heavy yard cleanup. But unfortunately the output shaft bushing hole is not in alignment with the locking rod slot which means that it is impossible to remove the cutting blade and install the grass trimmer. Just an example of what poor QC to what might be an otherwise decent product. Returned for credit.
customer_reviews.author: lesmok

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this weed eater about two months ago and the bevel head has cracked and the knob that connects the lower shaft to the upper has just about broken off. I've tried to contact customer service and they keep hanging up on me. Horrible customer service. I still can't get through
customer_reviews.author: Laxus

customer_reviews.title: but after I got it it works pretty good. I dont use it professionally all day ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I made the purchase and was kind of hesitant, but after I got it it works pretty good. I dont use it professionally all day and night, so I dont know how it will perform in that professional area, but for me it work perfectly for maintaining my property.
customer_reviews.author: Tsogtbileg E.

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: Started up great, but when we tried to change the heads, the nut was completely locked up. The tool they supply to change the heads bends and metal chunks began to fall off the head. When remmington referred me to a store to repair it, they refused to honor the warranty. Ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: nicoli

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I spent more time pulling the cord trying to start and restart this tool then actually cutting with it. Once I got it running it would heat up and DIE within 1-3 minutes. I would then have to wait 20-30 minutes for it to cool down before it would restart. Then over and over again for hours to finish a job that should have taken 30 minutes. I spent the extra money as recommended and got the upgraded blades they were awesome in the short bursts this machine would spin them around. I would find a better machine this is not a good product,
customer_reviews.author: Steve Matas

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a much better built ones than I usually see from the stores for the same price. Has plenty of power for aftermarket heads/blade attachments. Only issue is that if I run it for a long time and have to refuel, sometimes I have to let it cool down for about 20 minutes or it is dang near impossible to restart (why the 4 stars).
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We live on a mountain. There is a lot of brush on our property. I've used this thing for about 4 hours so far and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous2

customer_reviews.title: So far So Good
customer_reviews.text: It works good not spectacular like the Rodeo chainsaw I have that they make. I purchased a shoulder harness which makes it really easy when weed-eating. UPDATE, this Is a POS. It's a PIA to start as well as, to keep running. It bogs down on a consistent basis. It's made a job thats not fun In the first place into, a job that totally efin sucks.
customer_reviews.author: gary marrs

customer_reviews.title: Gas trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Good price and accessories fit nicely. Had to replace a new Craftsmen due to warranty claim.
customer_reviews.author: Mrjrm63

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome weed eater great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this weed eater right out of the box put it together put gas in it fired right up second pool used it several times and it works great I would definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Leland King

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS MUSCULAR
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY FUNCTIONAL, AS ALL REMINGTON PRODUCTS. HAS THE POWER. A BIT FUSSY TO START, SOMETIMES. GAS CONSUMPTION IS ON THE HIGH SIDE, NOT MODERATE LIKE OTHER REMINGTONS. IT WILL CLEAR THE FIELD, AS DESIRED.
customer_reviews.author: GILBERT R.

customer_reviews.title: Recoil starter broke after 1 hr. of use
customer_reviews.text: It started easily and cut very well but not very durable. The recoil starter cord stuck and I was unable to start it again after only maybe 1 hour of actual use. Unfortunately, my return window has closed so I stuck with something that none of the repair shops what to tackle
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: Brush trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush trimmer. This is way better than my other one. This has multiple attachments. Works and starts up beautifully with no issues. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M Salaets

customer_reviews.title: Overall It does a very good job.
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit heavier than I thought it would be. It is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer lec1952

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Of all my tools, this unit is at the top of my list. Starts great and with the blade installed it does the job of multiple tools. Weed/brush waker, chain saw, edger, trimmer just to name a few.
customer_reviews.author: DClos

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy this if u want the weed wacker attachment. The bolt to get the bush trimmer off is tightened way way way to much. I literally had to hang on my socket wrench to get to to break lose. And yes I was turning it the correct way
customer_reviews.author: Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap! Don’t waste your time or money. The metal blade is useless and VERY hard to get off. I switched to the wire and used it for about ten minutes before the machine died. I went to restart it and the cord wouldn’t retract. I hay last weed whacker for over ten years and used it alot. This is horrible- don’t even bother with it.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.text: was hesutant about buying. But it is light it is multi-purpose. Make sure to mix gas and oil right to avoid starting problems. My craftsman attachment even worked on it. So far have nothing but good to say time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Birdray75

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Bought in October to clear brush, worked great. Switched to grass trimmer also worked great. Reading reviews on having trouble getting nut off i did this worked with no problems. First i ground rhe tip of the rod a little at a time until it fit. To take the nut off you can use a wrench if you so double wrench it, i used a 3/8 rachet with a 18 inch piece of pipe for a cheater came right off with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: stephen s.

customer_reviews.title: Its WAY WAY WAY toooo heavy
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyy to heavy. Id love to return it but now.its used Dont buy this unless your STRONG
customer_reviews.author: Honest and caring

customer_reviews.title: Weed eater and brush cutter!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! I like the fact that you can convert it to both weed eater and brush cutter with all accessories included in the package!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent - but can't remove blade!
customer_reviews.text: Could NOT get factory stock blade off now matter how hard I tried. Other than that it was easy to start and ran decently. A bit underpowered, but I cut down a 50' by 20' patch of blackberries with it.
customer_reviews.author: JoyDad

customer_reviews.title: Only one that I can order in California due to emissions
customer_reviews.text: It cut beautifully thru tall brush. It a little heavier than a weed cutter. But will cut tallgrass. It a little hard to start. But willstart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Power
customer_reviews.text: Has much more power than the Husqvarna it replaced. Very versatile and now have added a pole saw and hedge trimmer in addition to string trimmer and brush cutting heads. Starts easy and runs strong!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Husband frustrated!!!
customer_reviews.text: Husband says this tool was a bad purchase. It is heavy and awkward; the string spool is poorly designed; he is very disappointed. Can’t understand good reviews. Used for regular yard weed whacking.
customer_reviews.author: Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Starts and runs great. Made quick work of the two hedge rows out back. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: afgunny

customer_reviews.title: ... replacement trimmer from the one that I gave the bad review This remmintom is actually a very good product ...
customer_reviews.text: Please disregard my last review this was a replacement trimmer from the one that I gave the bad review This remmintom is actually a very good product and recieved to the correct address Should have went with it first
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for clearing shooting lanes and making trails. It far exceeds my expectations. Will take down anything 2inch and smaller. Would definitely suggest it to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Vandy

customer_reviews.title: Stud of a Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love Remington brand. Even though I have a farm, I like my stuff color coordinated. Sue me! All my tools are orange haha! I have the little brother to this as a trimmer. It's straight shaft, works great. The cutter that this comes with works wonders. Yes, a better blade helps, but I haven't swapped mine out yet. It'll cut small saplings as is. The trimmer head is NOT an attachment. It is just the head and requires you to switch it out. Honestly, I bought this one for the 27cc motor and will not use the trimmer u less my other goes down. I bought this to add attachments. BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Cut through light brush quite well, a lot easier to handle than my 55 cc craftsman
customer_reviews.author: little joe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through heavy brush well. Getting it started the first time is a bear...
customer_reviews.author: Richard White

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor spool.
customer_reviews.text: Strong engine and durable. Spool however allows grass to enter, clog, and not allow string to come out. Guess I will have to buy an aftermarket spool and hope it’s better.
customer_reviews.author: Monomonster22

customer_reviews.title: Good whacker hard to start
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty good. But hard to start. Always end up starting in position 3 instead of position 1 like it recommends
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Runs great and i didn't have to sell a kidney to get it
customer_reviews.text: Runs everytime !!! I only use premixed fuel .I also bought the Rustler . happy ! Looking to get there 46cc chainsaw next
customer_reviews.author: sean marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this tool is fast starting and does the job -- nice--
customer_reviews.author: nick west

customer_reviews.title: Great product, at the best price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, at the best price, for a combination brushwacker and string trimmer. Good power, starts easily, just follow directions. Brush blade will cut small tree saplings over 1/2" thick and fly through thick briars.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Belleville

customer_reviews.title: I took the brush cutter to it and it was able to handle the job nicely! Weeds and grass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago because the person I had cutting my grass disappeared and I couldn't get anyone else to do it. Needless to say, my grass had grown out of control. Its Bermuda grass and it was probably about 6-8 inches high and really thick. I took the brush cutter to it and it was able to handle the job nicely! Weeds and grass. It went through them with no problem. I ran for about 2 1/2 hrs straight, only stopping to refill the gas tank and it ran like charm.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Engine runs hard but very powerful...and its a gas hog
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Remington RM2700 Ranchero 27cc 18-Inch Straight Shaft Gas Powered Brushcutter and String Trimmer-2-Cycle Lightweight Weed Wacker with Attachment Capabilities for Lawn Care, Orange
product_meta.description: The Remington RM2700 Ranchero 27cc 2-cycle gas powered straight shaft brush cutter is lightweight and easy to use. Its full-crank engine provides greater power, less vibration and longer equipment life. With its tough, powerful 27cc 2-cycle engine, this straight shaft brush-cutting machine is lightweight and easy to handle, so you can get under bushes and hard-to-reach places with minimal effort. With an 18" cutting width you can trim more grass and cut through dense weeds in less time, and the quick-change head allows you to convert from brush cutter blade to the large string trimmer bump head to blade in minutes. Quick Start technology is designed for smoother and easier pull starts, to get you up and running instantly and with little effort. The brush cutter is multi-use and comes with a fully equipped large bump head trimmer attachment, that will quickly edge and trim your yard with .095" line. The adjustable handle provides added comfort, ergonomic comfort and control for right or left-handed use. The Remington Ranchero Brush cutter is attachment capable to convert quickly into many other lawn care products such as a blower, edger or hedge trimmer with TrimmerPlus attachments and other compatible brands (attachments sold separately). 2-cycle oil included. Backed by a 2-year limited warranty. With the RM2700 Ranchero Brush cutter, not only will you have quality lawn equipment that is reliable, easy-to-use, and powerful, but with Remington, you will have a Yard Well Done.
feature_bullets: USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: Straight shaft design makes it easier to trim under bushes and hard to reach places. Quick-change head allows you to convert from blade to bump head in seconds saving you time.

POWERFUL CUTTER: 27cc full crank 2 cycle gas engine provides greater power and less vibration to give you firm control and make easy work of tough jobs. Large bump feed trimmer head saves time and feeds .095" round line.
HEAVY DUTY METAL BLADE: Durable, robust metal blade and 18" cutting width allows you to cut through dense vegetation and grass in less time.
QUICKSTART TECHNOLOGY: Designed for smoother and easier pull starts. Get going right away on yard work, lawn care, and other around the house projects.
J-HANDLE AND SHOULDER STRAP: Adjustable J-handle and shoulder strap decreases operator fatigue during use with greater control giving the operator comfortability and command.
ATTACHMENT-READY: Accepts TrimmerPlus and other compatible attachments to turn brush cutter into an edger, blower, hedge trimmer, cultivator and more.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
